item.title: About
item.description: I’m a self-taught software engineer whose career began at the age of 15. The last half decade has been largely focused on cloud infrastructure running distributed systems. Here are a few of my open-source contributions. If you wish to send me something that only myself is able to read, encrypt some message into a file with my pgp key and email it attached to devbytom@gmail.com. Professional experience Trade Republic Software Engineer @DataPlatform 2023 - current
